content:
We have a small follow-up block vote with six issues from @Chris Moesel . We'll take this up on the next FHIR-I call.

  • GF#21030 Another Unlinked URL (Chris Moesel)
  • GF#21031 Still More Unlinked URLs (Chris Moesel)
  • GF#21032 Reference to FHIR Release 3 should be FHIR Release 4 (Chris Moesel)
  • GF#21035 Typo: period vs instant (Chris Moesel)
  • GF#21037 CQL is Clinical Quality Language (Chris Moesel)
  • GF#21043 Propose a Change goes to SMART App Launch Issues on Github (Chris Moesel)

(I just announced this on the official FHIR-I mailing, and repeating here for visibility.)
Thanks @Josh Mandel. I noticed that none (except the last) have proposed resolutions. Should I assume you're proposing to accept them all as persuasive and adjust as suggested?
Nevermind. It looks like you just updated them w/ resolutions. I will not be able to make the vote -- but agree with all of the proposed resolutions.
Perfect, thanks! (And yes, sorry, I was multitasking on sending out the note and actually updating the issues ;-))
